# SMReport Autogenerated for Delphi/C++Builder<br />SMReport Designer for Delphi&C++Builder is written entirely in Object Pascal. SMReport is a native VCL report engine with runtime end-user designer and preview modes, groups with unlimited levels, flexible formated data output, native interface and report structure, multilanguage support on fly. With SMReport you can create a valuablis reports with minimum expenses and your users can modify existing reports or create own ones without any your operations.<br />[>> Detailed information](https://secure.shareit.com/shareit/product.html?productid=139015&affiliateid=200057808)
